title: Gravity
description: Librarian's note: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B00GIUBQVI.A chance meeting reshapes the lives of two strangers who soon learn that we don't always choose who we fall in love with; sometimes life chooses for us.Samantha Kelley thinks she's got it all figured out until she literally collides with Anthony "AJ" Hahn one fateful day, forcing her to question whether she's been missing something all along... Him.
author: Raven St. Pierre
